events.eventDescription: Name your project, change who leads the procurement, or add more colleagues. This step is optional.

eventTask.title: Change who is going to lead the procurement

events.eventDescription: The supplier list generated by the filtering tool will be applied to all pre-market engagement and call-off activities in this project. You will have to delete this list if you want to contact all suppliers that are available in this lot.
events.eventDescription1: The supplier list generated by the filtering tool will be applied to all pre-market engagement and call-off activities in this project. You will have to delete this list if you want to contact all suppliers that are available in this lot.
events.eventDescription2: Please note that the supplier list generated by this tool will be applied to all pre-market engagement and call-off activities in this project. You will have to delete this list if you want to contact all suppliers that are available in this lot.

eventTask.title: View or download your shortlisted suppliers

line5: Use the filtering tool to create and download a shortlist of suppliers and rate cards that provide the management consultancy services you need. Using this service means you're following the public sector procurement procedures.
line6: Before you create your shortlist, you can name your project, change who leads the procurement, or add more colleagues to your project to help you evaluate suppliers.
